name: Kavel
description:
Kavel is an accessible puzzle arcade game. Tetrominos from classic block games together with your favorite match-3 obsession make this a fresh new puzzle experience.



Rotate and drag the Tetromino to place it onto the puzzle grid. Watch the score rack up and the board adapt. An endless possibility space where you can test your mettle.

Attempt for the highest score among your friends or attempt the challenge of the long list of achievements. There's something here for everyone.

THREE SEPARATE GAME MODES


  • CASUAL MODE
    Take your time, plan your strategies and execute at your own pace. The next 50 shapes are yours to command.

  • FRENZY MODE
    The pressure is on! The next 90 seconds are a frantic mad dash straight to the top of score mountain. No time to think, only to rise to the challenge.

  • ZEN MODE
    Feeling the stress of the day? Is the weather getting you down? Boring meeting? This is where you zone out. This is where you zone out. There is no end, no obligations, this is digital bubble wrap.

FRESH BUT FAMILIAR

Kavel is a game that seems familiar but is in fact a truly unique and fresh experience. New gameplay ideas to challenge you with some of the play elements that you already know. Let yourself be surprised.

DESIGNED FOR LONGEVITY

Easy to play, hard to master. A layered score system, designed to engage you time after time as you learn the subtleties of storming the leaderboards.

ACHIEVEMENTS AND LEADERBOARDS

Full integration of achievements and leaderboards. Carefully designed achievements to playfully teach and surprise you. Approaching play from new perspectives.

BEAUTIFUL COLOR PALETTES - INCLUDING DARK MODE PALETTES

Style Kavel the way you like, all themes are created and perfected for an optimal play experience. Dip your finger in the paint and let's go!

PLAYFUL DESIGN

Minimal design language for optimal play experience. Instantly take in the board and the shapes for split second decisions.

BESPOKE AUDIO

A fun and lively audio experience that really pops. With music specially composed for Kavel to support the game's varied modes.

OPTIMIZED

Runs smoothly on every device.

COLORBLIND-FRIENDLY

The game does not rely on color and is playable with any form of color blindness. Further includes multiple colorpalettes optimised for any form of color blindness.
